item.title: Report X-2024051630
item.description:
Report X-2024051630

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-07T18:15:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-22
  • City: MAPLE GROVE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A HAZMAT AUDITOR BROUGHT HIS TRAM BY AND ASKED RESPONDER TO LOOK AT SOME HAZMATS ON HIS TRAM THAT HE THOUGHT MIGHT BE LEAKING AS HE SMELT A STRONG CHEMICAL ODOR COMING FROM ONE OF THE PACKAGES BUT EXTERNALLY DID NOT SEEM TO BE LEAKING. RESPONDER FOUND A PACKAGE WITH BOTH 5.1 AND 8 HAZARD DIAMONDS WITH A STRONG CHEMICAL ODOR AND UPON OPENING THE FLAPS RESPONDER FOUND 4 1GAL CONTAINERS WITH VENTED CAP AND ONE OF THE CONTAINERS LEAKED FROM CAP.
